comment: Well Aunt Linda... thats why we are able to have a fun, open, intelligent conversation on ALL things & not just discuss the weather! Vaccines have been around for awhile and have been shown to work...not just

comment: Vaccinated and feeling great! I thank God for the scientist who save humanity. Problem is there are still skeptics out there. I ask them, what about polio, german measles, smallpox, diphtheria, etc.?
amr:
